@@ -38,8 +43,8 @@

     name: 'chat-store',
     partialize: (state) =>
       Object.fromEntries(

@@ -38,13 +38,14 @@
 }
 
 const store = () => ({ ...initialState } as ChatState);
 
-export const useChatStore = create<ChatState>()(
+export const useChatStore = create<ChatState>()(devtools(

     name: 'chat-store',
     partialize: (state) =>
       Object.fromEntries(

+)
